description: Ottawa, SANA- The Canadian Global Research website has revealed that Britain had secretly sent special air forces to support its partner,
maintext:
Ottawa, SANA - The Canadian Global Research website has revealed that Britain had secretly sent special air forces to support its partner, "Israel," in the war of genocide that it has been waging for approximately 50 days against the Palestinians in the besieged Gaza Strip and it warned the British media against leaking any reports or news in this regard.
The website said in an article prepared by British investigative journalist Kit Klarenberg that the Media Advisory Committee for Defense and Security Affairs in Britain issued a warning to major British media outlets, including newspapers, against publishing any reports or information about sending special British air forces to support "Israel."
This step, according to the website, affirms London keenness to hide the truth about the "criminal acts" it has been carrying out in Gaza.
Britain was also one of the first Western countries to rush to publicly express its blind support for the occupation entity by deploying military equipment for maritime and air surveillance and two ships in the eastern Mediterranean in support of "Israel."
Bushra Dabin/ Ruaa Jazaeri
title: Global Research: Britain participated in aggression against Gaza
